channel.title: mount on LOVECTOR
channel.description: Recent content in mount on LOVECTOR

item.title: Detect and mount devices
item.description: 1. Check the blockdevices and the file systems that are assigned to those block devices. lsblk 2. What kind of device? sudo lshw|less 3. Mounting the USB-stick sudo mkdir /media/usbstick sudo mount /dev/sdf2 /media/usbstick 4. Did it work? lsblk
